sentences.english: Changle over mountain rivers flowing through hilly, water development, water rich.
sentences.chinese: 長樂以上，河流經丘陵山區，水系發育，水量豐富。

sentences.english: In the central regions you'll encounter rugged land and rolling hills.
sentences.chinese: 在中部地區，你會遇到崎嶇的土地和連綿起伏的丘陵。

sentences.english: My mountain is higher than your molehill.
sentences.chinese: 我的山要比你的丘陵高。

sentences.english: Dry year is relatively common in loess region, particularly spring drought.
sentences.chinese: 黃土丘陵區幹早年份較常見，春旱尤爲嚴重。

sentences.english: Objectives To reveal the methods of ticks control in hill areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探索江蘇省丘陵山區蜱的有效防制方法。

sentences.english: May be hard to pull off in some hilly cities.
sentences.chinese: 在平原城市還好，在丘陵城市就有點喫力了。

sentences.english: The dune area in the northwest of Shanxi Province, is an area developing into desert.
sentences.chinese: 晉西北丘陵緩坡風沙區是沙漠化正在發展區。

sentences.english: Inland plain-hills type in Jiangsu with major reservoir hosts: Apodemus agrarius, R.
sentences.chinese: 內陸平原丘陵型疫源地分佈於江蘇。

sentences.english: Cordillera Azul stretches eastward from the foothills of the Andes.
sentences.chinese: Azul山從安第斯山的丘陵地帶向東延伸。

sentences.english: These foothills have been farmed out with tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 這些丘陵地由於專種菸草而耗盡了地力。

sentences.english: Some suggestions are proposed for loess hilly area of south Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 爲寧夏南部黃土丘陵區生態恢復提出了幾點建議。

sentences.english: Objective To master the epidemic situation of human intestinal helminthiasis in hilly areas of Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解四川省丘陵地區腸道蠕蟲病流行現狀。

sentences.english: Lishui Town, is located in the hilly areas Whitehead, fertile land.
sentences.chinese: 白石水鎮地處丘陵地帶，土地肥沃。

sentences.english: The road wound through all these soft hills.
sentences.chinese: 馬路蜿蜒穿過這裏所有的低緩丘陵。

sentences.english: Northeast subordinates hills, rivers, the two sides flat terrain.
sentences.chinese: 東北部屬丘陵地帶，河流兩岸地勢平緩。

sentences.english: The Thames rises in the Cotswold Hills.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河發源於科茨沃爾德丘陵。
